# uptimekuma_notification_dingding (Resource)

DingDing notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_dingding" "example" {
  name        = "DingDing Notifications"
  webhook_url = "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
  secret_key  = "SECxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_dingding" "critical" {
  name        = "DingDing Critical Alerts"
  webhook_url = "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=critical-token"
  secret_key  = "SECcritical-secret-key"
  mentioning  = "@all"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) DingDing webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `mentioning` (String) Users to mention in the notification
- `secret_key` (String, Sensitive) DingDing secret key for signature verification

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
